rulings.text: A spell's mana value is determined only by its mana cost. Ignore any alternative costs, additional costs, cost increases, or cost reductions.
If the discovered card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.
If you can't cast the discovered card (perhaps because there are no legal targets for the spell), you'll put it into your hand.

If you cast a spell "without paying its mana cost", you can't choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the spell has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those to cast it.

If you discover an adventurer card, split card, or modal double-faced card, you might be able to cast that card with either set of characteristics depending on the effect's discover value. For example, if you discover 4 and reveal Galvanic Giant (an adventurer card from Wilds of Eldraine with a mana value of 4), you could cast Galvanic Giant, but not Storm Reading (its Adventure, which has a mana value of 7). If you discover 7 and reveal Galvanic Giant, you could cast either Galvanic Giant or Storm Reading.

Some spells and abilities that cause you to discover may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve and you won't discover.

The mana value of a split card is determined by the combined mana cost of its two halves. If discover allows you to cast a split card, you may cast either half (as long as its mana value is less than or equal to the effect's discover value) but not both halves.
When you discover, you must exile cards. The only optional part of the ability is whether you cast the exiled card or put it into your hand.
You exile the cards face up. All players will be able to see them.

mainBoard.name: Bonehoard Dracosaur
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying, first strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them this turn. If you exiled a land card this way, create a 3/1 red Dinosaur creature token. If you exiled a nonland card this way, create a Treasure token.

rulings.text: If you exile a land card and a nonland card, you'll create a Dinosaur token, then a Treasure token.
If you exile two land cards, you'll create only one Dinosaur token. Similarly, if you exile two nonland cards, you'll create only one Treasure token.

You pay all costs and follow all normal timing rules for cards played this way. For example, if one of the exiled cards is a land card, you may play it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.

(Exilez les cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque jusqu'à ce que vous exiliez une carte non-terrain avec une valeur de mana inférieure ou égale à 3. Lancez-la sans payer son coût de mana ou mettez-la dans votre main. Mettez le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans un ordre aléatoire.)

foreignData.name: Caparocti Figlio del Sole
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta Caparocti Figlio del Sole attacca, puoi TAPpare due artefatti e/o creature STAPpati che controlli. Se lo fai, scopri 3. (Esilia carte dalla cima del tuo grimorio finché non esili una carta non terra con valore di mana pari o inferiore a 3. Lanciala senza pagare il suo costo di mana o aggiungila alla tua mano. Metti le altre in fondo in ordine casuale.)

foreignData.name: カパロクティ・サンボーン
foreignData.text: カパロクティ・サンボーンが攻撃するたび、アーティファクトやクリーチャーでありあなたがコントロールしていてアンタップ状態である２つをタップしてもよい。そうしたなら、発見３を行う。（マナ総量が３以下であり土地でないカード１枚が追放されるまで、あなたのライブラリーの一番上から１枚ずつ追放していく。それをマナ・コストを支払うことなく唱えるか、あなたの手札に加える。残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に無作為の順番で置く。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.name: Caparocti, Filho do Sol
foreignData.text: Toda vez que Caparocti, Filho do Sol, ataca, você pode virar dois artefatos e/ou criaturas desvirados que você controla. Se fizer isso, descubra 3. (Exile cards do topo do seu grimório até exilar um card não de terreno com valor de mana igual ou inferior a 3. Conjure sem pagar o custo de mana ou coloque-o na sua mão. Coloque o restante no fundo do grimório em ordem aleatória.)

foreignData.name: 炫日卡帕罗提
foreignData.text: 每当炫日卡帕罗提攻击时，你可以横置两个由你操控且未横置的神器和／或生物。若你如此作，则倾探3。（从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于3的非地牌为止。施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）
foreignData.type: 传奇生物 — 人类／士兵

mainBoard.name: Caparocti Sunborn
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Caparocti Sunborn attacks, you may tap two untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control. If you do, discover 3. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

rulings.text: A spell's mana value is determined only by its mana cost. Ignore any alternative costs, additional costs, cost increases, or cost reductions.
If Caparocti Sunborn is untapped as its ability is resolving (for example, if it has vigilance), it can be tapped for its own ability.
If the discovered card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.
If you can't cast the discovered card (perhaps because there are no legal targets for the spell), you'll put it into your hand.

If you cast a spell "without paying its mana cost", you can't choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the spell has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those to cast it.

If you discover an adventurer card, split card, or modal double-faced card, you might be able to cast that card with either set of characteristics depending on the effect's discover value. For example, if you discover 4 and reveal Galvanic Giant (an adventurer card from Wilds of Eldraine with a mana value of 4), you could cast Galvanic Giant, but not Storm Reading (its Adventure, which has a mana value of 7). If you discover 7 and reveal Galvanic Giant, you could cast either Galvanic Giant or Storm Reading.

Some spells and abilities that cause you to discover may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve and you won't discover.

The mana value of a split card is determined by the combined mana cost of its two halves. If discover allows you to cast a split card, you may cast either half (as long as its mana value is less than or equal to the effect's discover value) but not both halves.
When you discover, you must exile cards. The only optional part of the ability is whether you cast the exiled card or put it into your hand.

You can tap any two untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control, including creatures you haven't controlled continuously since the beginning of your most recent turn, for Caparocti Sunborn's ability.
You exile the cards face up. All players will be able to see them.

Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

foreignData.name: Versteckter Vulkan
foreignData.text:
Der Versteckte Vulkan kommt getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erzeuge {R}.
{4}{R}, {T}, opfere den Versteckten Vulkan: Entdeckung 4. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit wie eine Hexerei. (Schicke Karten oben von deiner Bibliothek ins Exil, bis du eine Nichtland-Karte mit Manabetrag 4 oder weniger ins Exil schickst. Wirke sie, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen, oder nimm sie auf deine Hand. Lege den Rest in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter die Bibliothek.)

foreignData.name: Volcán escondido
foreignData.text:

{T}: Agrega {R}.

(Exilia cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca hasta que exilies una carta que no sea tierra con valor de maná de 4 o menos. Lánzala sin pagar su coste de maná o ponla en tu mano. Pon el resto en el fondo en un orden aleatorio.)

foreignData.flavorText: „Was? Das ist für später."
foreignData.name: Hortende Zelebrantin
foreignData.text: Wenn die Hortende Zelebrantin ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine andere bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist und die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurückbringen. Falls du dies tust, wende Hellsicht 2 an.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Qué? Lo guardo para luego".
foreignData.name: Celebrante de las reservas
foreignData.text: Cuando la Celebrante de las reservas entre al campo de batalla, puedes regresar otro permanente objetivo que no sea tierra que controlas a la mano de su propietario. Si lo haces, adivina 2.

foreignData.flavorText: « Quoi ? Je le garde pour plus tard. »
foreignData.name: Célébrante accumulatrice
foreignData.text: Quand la Célébrante accumulatrice arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez renvoyer un autre permanent non-terrain ciblé que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire. Si vous faites ainsi, regard 2.

foreignData.flavorText: "Che c'è? Lo conservo per dopo."
foreignData.name: Celebrante Accumulatrice
foreignData.text: Quando la Celebrante Accumulatrice entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi far tornare un altro permanente non terra bersaglio che controlli in mano al suo proprietario. Se lo fai, profetizza 2.

foreignData.flavorText: 「何？後のためにとっておくのよ。」
foreignData.name: 備え蓄える祝賀者
foreignData.text: 備え蓄える祝賀者が戦場に出たとき、あなたがコントロールしていて土地でもこれでもないパーマネント１つを対象とする。それをオーナーの手札に戻してもよい。そうしたなら、占術２を行う。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ドワーフ・騎士

foreignData.flavorText: "Quê foi? Vou guardar pra depois."
foreignData.name: Celebrante Acumuladora
foreignData.text: Quando Celebrante Acumuladora entra no campo de batalha, você pode devolver outra permanente não de terreno alvo que você controla para a mão de seu dono. Se fizer isso, use vidência 2.

foreignData.flavorText: 「怎么？我不过是想留着晚点再吃罢了。」
foreignData.name: 堆囤贵客
foreignData.text: 当堆囤贵客进战场时，你可以将另一个目标由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。若你如此作，则占卜2。

mainBoard.name: Stockpiling Celebrant
mainBoard.originalText: When Stockpiling Celebrant enters the battlefield, you may return another target nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand. If you do, scry 2.
mainBoard.text: When Stockpiling Celebrant enters, you may return another target nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand. If you do, scry 2.

mainBoard.flavorText: Few humans are steady-handed enough to match a gnome's precision. Even the slightest change to a single line can wildly alter a glyph's meaning.

foreignData.flavorText: Nur wenige Menschen haben so ruhige Hände, dass sie mit der Präzision eines Gnoms mithalten können. Selbst die kleinste Abweichung bei einer einzigen Linie kann die Bedeutung einer Glyphe dramatisch verändern.
foreignData.name: Sorgfältiger Sonnenschreiber
foreignData.text: Immer wenn der Sorgfältige Sonnenschreiber getappt wird, wende Hellsicht 1 an. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst sie unter deine Bibliothek legen.)

foreignData.flavorText: Pocos humanos tienen el pulso necesario para estar a la altura de la precisión de un gnomo. El más mínimo cambio en una línea puede alterar gravemente el significado de un glifo.
foreignData.name: Escriba solar avizor
foreignData.text: Siempre que el Escriba solar avizor se gire, adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo.)

foreignData.flavorText: Rares sont les humains qui ont la main suffisamment sûre pour égaler la précision d'un gnome. Le moindre tremblement en dessinant une ligne peut radicalement modifier le sens d'un glyphe.
foreignData.name: Scribe solaire attentif
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que le Scribe solaire attentif devient engagé, regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre cette carte au-dessous.)

foreignData.flavorText: Neanche la mano umana più ferma è paragonabile alla precisione di uno gnomo. Il più piccolo cambiamento a una singola riga può stravolgere il significato di un glifo.
foreignData.name: Scriba Solare Attento
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta lo Scriba Solare Attento viene TAPpato, profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi metterla in fondo.)

foreignData.flavorText: ノームの精密性と張り合えるほどに手元が狂わない人間などいないに等しい。ほんの少しでも線が狂うだけで、その文字の意味は大きく違ってしまうのだ。
foreignData.name: 注意深い太陽写し
foreignData.text: 注意深い太陽写しがタップ状態になるたび、占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード１枚を見る。そのカードを一番下に置いてもよい。）
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — ノーム

foreignData.flavorText: Poucos humanos têm mãos firmes o suficiente para se comparar à precisão de um gnomo. Mesmo a mais leve diferença numa única linha pode alterar imensamente o significado de um glifo.
foreignData.name: Escriba Solar Cuidadoso
foreignData.text: Toda vez que Escriba Solar Cuidadoso se tornar virado, use vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo.)

foreignData.flavorText: 论精准稳定，鲜有人类的手工技艺能与侏械相媲美。哪怕是一条直线上的细微出入，都会极大影响雕符含义。
foreignData.name: 专注阳刻械
foreignData.text: 每当专注阳刻械成为横置时，占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

mainBoard.name: Attentive Sunscribe
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Attentive Sunscribe becomes tapped, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
mainBoard.text: Whenever Attentive Sunscribe becomes tapped, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

mainBoard.flavorText: The Core was sealed long ago by the Deep Gods, who set the angels to the eternal task of defending its golden gates.

foreignData.flavorText: Der Weltenkern wurde von den Göttern der Tiefen versiegelt, die den Engeln die Aufgabe auferlegten, seine goldenen Pforten bis in alle Ewigkeit zu bewachen.
foreignData.name: Wächterin der Großen Pforte
foreignData.text:
Tappe als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, vier ungetappte Artefakte, Kreaturen und/oder Länder, die du kontrollierst.
Fliegend

foreignData.flavorText: Los Dioses Profundos sellaron el núcleo tiempo ha y encomendaron a los ángeles la tarea eterna de defender sus puertas doradas.
foreignData.name: Guardiana de la gran puerta
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, gira cuatro criaturas, tierras y/o artefactos enderezados que controlas.
Vuela.

foreignData.flavorText: Le Noyau avait été depuis longtemps scellé par les Dieux des Profondeurs, qui donnèrent aux anges la mission éternelle de défendre ses portes dorées.
foreignData.name: Gardienne de la Grande porte
foreignData.text:

rulings.text: A card, spell, or permanent is an outlaw if it has the Assassin, Mercenary, Pirate, Rogue, or Warlock creature type. It doesn’t matter if it has more than one of those creature types; as long as it has at least one, it’s an outlaw.

If an ability refers to an outlaw or whether a player controls an outlaw, it’s referring only to permanents with one or more of the creature types specified above. Notably, it’s not referring to any spell or card not on the battlefield. However, other abilities may refer to an “outlaw spell” or “outlaw card” in a zone other than the battlefield. Those abilities refer to spells and cards with one or more of the specified creature types.
Outlaw is not a creature type. If an effect asks you to choose a creature type, you can’t choose outlaw.

mainBoard.name: On the Job
mainBoard.originalText: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

rulings.text: Clue is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some cards with other permanent types, it’s never a creature type, a land type, or anything but an artifact type.
If an effect refers to a Clue, it means any Clue artifact, not just a Clue artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Wrench to pay for Alquist Proft, Master Sleuth’s activated ability.
Some abilities trigger “whenever you sacrifice a Clue”. Those abilities trigger whenever you sacrifice a Clue for any reason, not just to activate a Clue’s activated ability.

Some spells and abilities that investigate may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won’t resolve. You won’t create any Clue tokens.
You can’t sacrifice a Clue to pay multiple costs. For example, you can’t sacrifice a Clue token to activate its own ability and also to activate Alquist Proft, Master Sleuth’s ability.

mainBoard.name: Hit the Mother Lode
mainBoard.originalText: Discover 10. If the discovered card's mana value is less than 10, create a number of tapped Treasure tokens equal to the difference. (To discover 10, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 10 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

rulings.text: A spell's mana value is determined only by its mana cost. Ignore any alternative costs, additional costs, cost increases, or cost reductions.
If the discovered card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.
If you can't cast the discovered card (perhaps because there are no legal targets for the spell), you'll put it into your hand.

If you cast a spell "without paying its mana cost", you can't choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the spell has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those to cast it.

If you discover an adventurer card, split card, or modal double-faced card, you might be able to cast that card with either set of characteristics depending on the effect's discover value. For example, if you discover 4 and reveal Galvanic Giant (an adventurer card from Wilds of Eldraine with a mana value of 4), you could cast Galvanic Giant, but not Storm Reading (its Adventure, which has a mana value of 7). If you discover 7 and reveal Galvanic Giant, you could cast either Galvanic Giant or Storm Reading.

Some spells and abilities that cause you to discover may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve and you won't discover.

The mana value of a split card is determined by the combined mana cost of its two halves. If discover allows you to cast a split card, you may cast either half (as long as its mana value is less than or equal to the effect's discover value) but not both halves.
When you discover, you must exile cards. The only optional part of the ability is whether you cast the exiled card or put it into your hand.
You exile the cards face up. All players will be able to see them.

You won't create any Treasure tokens until you finish discovering. For example, if the card you discover has "As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact," you can't sacrifice one of the Treasures from Hit the Mother Lode to pay that additional cost.

mainBoard.text: Discover 10. If the discovered card's mana value is less than 10, create a number of tapped Treasure tokens equal to the difference. (To discover 10, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 10 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

foreignData.flavorText: Le Mille Lune si addestrano e combattono in affiatate squadre da dieci. Una Luna su dieci ricopre il ruolo di ufficiale, una su cento di capitano e la millesima, Anim Pakal, di comandante supremo.
foreignData.name: Fanteria delle Mille Lune
foreignData.text: STAPpa la Fanteria delle Mille Lune durante lo STAP di ogni altro giocatore.

foreignData.flavorText: 千の月は固く結ばれた十人の部隊を一つの単位として、戦いに赴く。十番目の月は士官であり、百番目の月は隊長である。そして千番目の月、アニム・パカルは総司令となる。
foreignData.name: 千の月の歩兵部隊
foreignData.text: あなた以外の各プレイヤーのアンタップ・ステップに、千の月の歩兵部隊をアンタップする。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: Os Mil Luas treinam e lutam em esquadrões compactos de dez. Cada décima Lua age como oficial, cada centésima como capitão e a milésima, Anim Pakal, como comandante suprema.
foreignData.name: Infantaria dos Mil Luas
foreignData.text: Desvire Infantaria dos Mil Luas durante a etapa de desvirar de cada outro jogador.

foreignData.flavorText: 千月军通常十人编作一队，同队成员共同训练作战，结下深厚情谊。如此，每十人一名十月长，每百人一名百月长，而到千月之势时，便由最高统帅阿妮帕卡来统筹全军。
foreignData.name: 千月军步兵
foreignData.text: 于每位其他牌手的重置步骤中，重置千月军步兵。

mainBoard.name: Thousand Moons Infantry
mainBoard.originalText: Untap Thousand Moons Infantry during each other player's untap step.

rulings.text: If an effect states that Thousand Moons Infantry doesn't untap during your untap step, that effect won't apply during another player's untap step.
Thousand Moons Infantry still untaps during your untap step as normal.
Thousand Moons Infantry untaps at the same time as the active player's permanents. You can't choose not to untap it at that time.

mainBoard.text: Untap Thousand Moons Infantry during each other player's untap step.
